Summary: has been seen every evening for past two weeks
divs: Sighting Details1. Jan.7,2012 We were outside the front of our home and looked up at the sky and saw what appeeared to be a bright object hovering but stationary lower than the stars that were out that evening. 2.what made us notice was the brightness and apeared to have a round globe shape and sometimes what looked like wings making the whole object look triangular at times. Jan.8,2012 another sighting, but different location 3.I thought it was a UFO 4.Very bright white globe shaped or round with sometimes a triangular shaped wing. At times it moves obruptly side to side and thats when it appears to have to wings to make it move. 5. wondering what it could be,was it a satelite or what. We were a little scared. 6. We just went in the house after seeing this. the object or UFO has been either close to my house or across the hywy or back again for about two weeks maybe longer.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Nowata
This sighting has never been favorited.
